name: National Park Girls
description: All Eve ever wanted was to protect and preserve the land, but after five years of being a ranger in Yosemite National Park, she’s just about ready to throw in the towel. However, things start to change when she meets three spritely girls who claim to represent the National Parks.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows XP 处理器: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor 内存: 1024 MB RAM 图形: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card DirectX 版本: 9.0c 存储空间: 需要 1 GB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows Vista or above 内存: 1024 MB RAM 图形: 1920 x 1080 display
